10 years ago today, an anonymous cryptographer made history.  Thank you Satoshi! #bitcoin

Today is the 10 year anniversary of the Bitcoin network.  Satoshi Nakamoto mined the genesis block on Jan the 3rd 2009.  In that block he/she/they encoded a secret message "Chancellor on brink of second bailout for banks".  That's the reason Bitcoin exists. Bitcoin is the cure.  https://t.co/W1bspbsJtO

Ten years ago today, Satoshi Nakamoto mined the Genesis block of the Bitcoin network, turning a vision into a reality. Every day since, blocks continue to be mined, and the network continues to grow.  Here's to a future of sound money and economic freedom. Thanks, Satoshi!  https://t.co/koPA7ccZBQ

10 years ago the genesis block was mined, containing this message:  “The Times 03/Jan/2009 Chancellor on brink of second bailout for banks”  Bitcoin has been one of the most important steps towards freedom that we’ve seen in the last 100 years. Happy birthday, Bitcoin.

7/ While many are obsessed with making price predictions about #Bitcoin in 2019, one thing we can actually predict with high certainty is that Bitcoin blocks will continue to be created approximately every 10 minutes with remarkable reliability.

8/ As the Bitcoin network continues to function reliably well into the next decade, there will be near-universal confidence that it will be available forever, much as people believe the Internet is a permanent feature of the modern world.
